name: Andropolis Rising: Blood Revival
description:
Atlas Flynn is an ordinary bartender in cyber city, or at least ordinary by this city's standards...

Most people in Andropolis have been fitted with special microchip enhancements in order to give them special abilities, but more importantly to allow them to walk among the sun.

Atlas Flynn was one of Andropolis's enhanced citizens until his chips were STOLEN, forcing Atlas to decend into the night to obtain his chips before sunrise!


Controls
Arrow keys to move and jump, Ctrl to attack

Using: 

PlayBuffer and FMOD

Team

Code
Duncan Gallagher and Fagin Hales

Art
Lyla Taguma andErrol Chopral

Sound
Andrew Ramsey and Arin Eakins

Music
Owen McDonnell
